title: 赫斯顿·布鲁门撒尔：情绪波动激发了这位厨师的才华。但高潮越来越高，低谷也越来越暗淡。 --- Heston Blumenthal: Mood swings fuelled the chef's genius. But the highs got higher and the lows got darker

content: Mood swings fuelled Heston Blumenthal's genius. But the highs got higher and the lows got darker情绪波动激发了赫斯顿·布鲁门撒尔的才华。但高潮越来越高，低谷也越来越暗淡。4 hours agoShareSaveChloe Hayward  克洛伊·海沃德BBC News•chloefhaywardBBC 新闻 • 克洛夫·海沃德ShareSave  节省Shutterstock"We just wanted a relaxing conversation with our dad and we weren't able to have one," says Jack Blumenthal. "It was horrible. And it was constant."“我们只是想和爸爸轻松聊聊，但却没能做到，”杰克·布鲁门撒尔说。“这太可怕了，而且总是这样。”Raw pain is etched on Jack's father's face as he finally realises h...

title: 印度航空：艾哈迈达巴德坠机现场发现黑匣子，家属等待答案 --- Air India: Black box found at Ahmedabad crash site as families wait for answers
newsTitle: Black box found at Air India crash site as families wait for answers印度航空坠机现场找到黑匣子，家属等待答案
content: Black box found at Air India crash site as families wait for answers印度航空坠机现场找到黑匣子，家属等待答案3 hours agoShareSaveLucy Clarke-Billings  露西·克拉克-比林斯BBC News  BBC 新闻Share  分享Save  节省EPA  美国环保署A black box has been found at the site of the Air India plane crash in Ahmedabad, India's civil aviation minister said on Friday. 印度民航部长周五表示，在艾哈迈达巴德印度航空坠机现场发现了黑匣子。The flight data recorder was recovered within 28 hours by India's Aircraft Accident Investigation Bureau (AAIB), Ram Mohan Naidu Kinjarapu confirmed. 拉姆·莫...
